segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, and it's surprising how the woman doesn't notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is getting bigger, and she's just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the children are being very quiet while they try to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, and it's surprising he hasn't fallen yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl looks so cute, waiting for a cookie with her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and tidy compared to the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the woman is so focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen seems so cozy, but there's a little chaos happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the cookie jar is full, and it's surprising the children haven't been caught yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should be more aware of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the children get their cookies without any trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised how calm everything seems despite the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR
